alert.note: Alert for Lyon (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 08 at 2:13PM CST until January 09 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Iowa, southwest Minnesota and east central and southeast South Dakota. * WHEN...Until noon CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
